post:
Guys, today is my birthday so I want to give this exclusive offer for all LES users, I want to thank @AnthonySmith for letting me post early this offer.

I'm offering 50% discount for all products from my website (https://tetahost.com/), the only exception is for the LES Offer which is already discounted.

Discount is recurring, available for all billing cycles and for all hosting packages (shared, reseller and VPS). Use **LES** promo code when you place the order. It's available only today and tomorrow.

For any question please contact me  B) 

Enjoy it.
